title: Sustainable nanocarriers fabricated by the dipeptide-based co-assemblies for enhancing the delivery and translocation of herbicide
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00696H, Paper
Zirui Zheng, Ziyun Yang, Zehua Meng, Siyang Liu, Tianyue Wu, Chengyi He, Chenhui Zhang, Ma Chen, Yuxia Gao, Fengpei Du
Pesticide delivery platforms are effective means to improve the control efficiency of pesticide through multiple functionalities. However, the prevalent use of pesticide carriers is often hindered by complex synthetic pathways,...
